summary:
This adds a potion that will transform you instantly into a vampire, vampire lord or Werewolf.
Includes all esp.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/main1_zpstkhby4lk.png[/img][/center]


[img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/description_zps6rx893m7.png[/img]
[list=1][size=3][font=Candara]
This adds a potion that will transform you into a vampire or werewolf without worrying anything.
This also adds a potion that cures you from Vampirism and Lycanthropy

For now, these potions can be made through cooking pot

More Description:
Same as the original curing Lycanthropy, it will summon your werewolf spirit after curing your state.

Vampire Lord
Summons your Vampire Lord spirit after curing your Vampirism

[/font][/size][/list]

[img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/ingridients_zpsj3sxllrr.png[/img]
[list=1][size=3][font=Candara]
These are the needed ingridients for the following potions:
[list]
Potion of Vampirism: [list]Human Heart(1), HumanFlesh(1), Saltpile(2)[/list]
Blessed Water: [list]Saltpile(1), Garlic(5), Ectoplasm(1)[/list]

Potion of Lycanthropy: [list]Saltpile(1), Ectoplasm(1)[/list]
Clear Water: [list]Briar Heart(1), Ectoplasm(1)[/list]

NEW(Requires Dawnguard)
Potion of Vampirism Lord:
[list]Daedra Heart(1),Human Heart(1), HumanFlesh(1), Saltpile(2)[/list]
[/list]
[/font][/size][/list]

[img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/installation_zps7opubcpl.png[/img]
[list=1][size=3][font=Candara]
Activate with any mod installer
Doesn't require load orders

This mod is cleaned with TES5Edit
[/font][/size][/list]

[img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/upgrading_zpsxgsd6zps.png[/img]
[list=1][size=3][font=Candara]
When Upgrading to Dawnguard Compatible:
[list]
- Do not use any potion in game and wait for 24 hours
- Make a new save
- Uninstall my mod then Load your save
- Overwrite your save
- install new version
- Done.
[/list]

For No Dawnguard esp. Just download the misc scripts and overwrite the old scripts
(Just fixed some minor issues)


This mod is cleaned with TES5Edit
[/font][/size][/list]

[img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/requirements_zpscimqwzqp.png[/img]
[list=1][size=3][font=Candara]
Skyrim v 1.9+
SKSE v 1.9+
[/font][/size][/list]

[img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/compatibility_zpsg5cx93vy.png[/img]
[list=1][size=3][font=Candara]
Not compatible with mods that changes:
[list]
PlayerVampireQuest(Script) = VampireChange, VampireCure
[s]PlayerWerewolfQuest(Script)[/s]
C00(companionshousekeepingscript) = WerewolfCure
[/list]
For a patch request: please post in the comment section

[/font][/size][/list]

[img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/issues_zpseuxnhvng.png[/img]
[list=1][size=3][font=Candara]
v 1.0 : None
v 11 : None
Post one if you found a bug
[/font][/size][/list]

[img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/Recommended_zps6nxl95i8.png[/img]
[list=1][size=3][font=Candara]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9717//?]Better Vampires[/url] by Brehanin
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38829//?]BVFE - Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes[/url] by Alpex 8
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22565//?]Royal Bloodline - Vampire Lord perk tree - abilities - and more [/url] by xyks
[/font][/size][/list]

[img]http://i1277.photobucket.com/albums/y497/QuadLegacy/credits_zpsfhw8kpp4.png[/img]
[list=1][size=3][font=Candara]
Ronsan123 (For the photos and scripts)
Zim8662 (This is based on his mod)
Bethesda
SkyrimNexusMod
[/font][/size][/list]
author: UnknownHuman
